attributes.action: Withdraw from the European Court Of Human Rights and Repeal the Human Rights Legislation From British Law
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Human Rights Legislation has been abused to the detrement of this country. Convicted Prisoners, bogus asylum seekers, terrorists, and fundamentslists have all used this legislation against the law abiding British people of all creeds and by removing it maybe we can replace with legislation based upon common sense and merit rather Harriet Harman's pathetic attempts at discriminatory social engineering.
